attributes.action: instruct the Bank of England to increase the base lending rate to restore the value of Sterling and reward prudent savers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The current low base rate has destroyed the value of the pound against the Euro, and has removed any incentive for anyone to save money in Banks. Rather than encouraging people to save this government is energetically supporting people in spend spend spend.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
